definition: short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)

sentences.english: Out in the ocean any floating refuge can save the life of an exhausted bird.
sentences.chinese: 辽阔的大洋上任何浮物都能让疲累得鸟儿憩息。

sentences.english: Extraoral vast shoals of the Pearl River waterfront, the underwater beach off the coast to slow gradient.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口外海滨滩涂辽阔，水下滩地向岸外缓慢坡降。

sentences.english: He also founded the vast Yuan Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他还建立了幅员辽阔的元大帝国呢。

sentences.english: China stretches across vast area covering the cold, temperate and tropical zones.
sentences.chinese: 中国幅员辽阔，包括了寒带，温带和热带。

sentences.english: This vast territory of the Big Island made thousands of miles, everywhere hungry die of hunger.
sentences.chinese: 把这个地域辽阔的大岛弄得赤地千里，饿殍遍地。

sentences.english: However I still prefer to ride horses on the high plateau and hunt eagles with bow and arrows.
sentences.chinese: 不过我还是更喜欢骑马驰骋在辽阔的高原，弯弓射雕。

sentences.english: Much blood, however, yet remained to be spilled upon the good Chinese earth.
sentences.chinese: 在中国辽阔的大地上，正孕育着新的重大流血斗争。

sentences.english: This desert island is a beautiful land of silence and space.
sentences.chinese: 这个荒岛是一片美丽的地地，沉寂，辽阔。

sentences.english: The tremendous spaciousness of it was glowing with rich gold .
sentences.chinese: 苍茫辽阔的景色染上了一片瑰丽浓艳的金黄色。

sentences.english: Green jade blue sky with broad ocean water the sky connect.
sentences.chinese: 碧蓝的天空与辽阔的大海水天相接。

sentences.english: Broad belts of the virgin wilderness not only reached the shores of the first river, but they even crossed it.
sentences.chinese: 广漠辽阔的处女地不仅伸展到河两岸，甚至越过它。

sentences.english: On the vast fields, one sees nothing but the wheat billowing in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 在辽阔的原野上，但见麦浪随风起伏。

sentences.english: The ocean, as kind -hearted large-minded people, it accepted everything.
sentences.chinese: 辽阔的大海，如同善良人的宽大胸襟，它接纳了一切。

sentences.english: We are two great and huge nations on opposite sides of the globe .
sentences.chinese: 我们是两个疆土辽阔的大国，分处地球的两端。

sentences.english: China is so vast that whatever you report is an incomplete picture.
sentences.chinese: 中国如此辽阔，我们的报告终归是一幅不全面的画图。

definition: to stretch as far as the eye can see (idiom)
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
